 The SAT has three major portions. Language, Analysis, and Math. You will receive scaled and percentile scores. It is as nerve wracking as any standardized test. Many of the east coast schools use this test exclusively. The ACT is most commonly used. However, the SAT is more similar to the GRE (Graduate Record Exam) for grad school.
